suggestedFixes.fix: Add visual diagram showing delegation flow with visibility checkpoints within first 600px viewport

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement sticky bottom bar on mobile at 80px height with primary CTA after 20% scroll
suggestedFixes.rationale: Persistent conversion path maintains momentum through long-form content

suggestedFixes.fix: Embed mini audit log preview (3 recent actions) directly in hero at 40% width on desktop
suggestedFixes.rationale: Immediate proof of visibility/control addresses core delegation anxiety upfront

suggestedFixes.fix: Add '14-day free trial, cancel anytime' badge prominently at pricing table top with 24px font
suggestedFixes.rationale: Risk reversal must be unmissable to overcome small business commitment fears

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder mobile stack: promise first, headline second, proof third within 568px viewport
suggestedFixes.rationale: Mobile-first hierarchy ensures core value visible without scrolling

suggestedFixes.fix: Restructure to: Hero → How It Works (3 steps) → Proof → Suite → Pricing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Earlier mechanism explanation reduces confusion and builds trust progressively

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement 28px H2 subheads with 80px spacing between sections for visual breathing room
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clear typographic hierarchy enables 5-second page scanning for busy owners

suggestedFixes.fix: Create proof bar component with rotating customer metrics (tasks completed, hours saved)
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete numbers build trust faster than abstract feature descriptions

suggestedFixes.fix: Change CTA to 'Start delegating safely today - 14 day trial' with countdown timer
suggestedFixes.rationale: Specific action verb plus urgency overcomes analysis paralysis

suggestedFixes.fix: Set all mobile CTAs to minimum 56px height with 16px padding for thumb comfort
